Ancestry-Gnome -- Male Wellspring Gnome Cleric
Strength: 10 (+0) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 14 (+2) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 0/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 25 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry Selectable Feature Count: Cleric (Doctrine); Gnome (Heritage); Gnome (Wellspring)
Feats: Animal Accomplice; Animal Elocutionist; Burrow Elocutionist; Domain Initiate (Protection); Energized Font; Fey Fellowship; First World Adept; First World Magic; Gnome Obsession; Gnome Weapon Expertise; Gnome Weapon Familiarity; Gnome Weapon Innovator; Illusion Sense; Vivacious Conduit Cleric Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Cleric Skills; Defense Trained (Unarmored Defense); Deity; Divine Font; Divine Spellcasting; Doctrine; Perception Trained; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Spell Trained (Divine); Warpriest Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Gnome Features: Ability Boost (Charisma; Constitution; Choose 1 from any); Ability Flaw (Strength); Ancestry Feats; Chameleon Gnome; Divine Wellspring; Fey-Touched Gnome; Gnome Heritage; Low-Light Vision; Sensate Gnome; Umbral Gnome; Wellspring Gnome
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Animal Accomplice: Has the Familiar feature
Deity: Has the Anathema feature
Divine Font: Has the Healing Font feature
Doctrine: 1 selection
Gnome Heritage: 1 selection
Umbral Gnome: Has the Darkvision feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Wellspring Gnome: 1 selection
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Shelyn
Chameleon Gnome: Can use a 1-hr process to change skin and hair colors
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Fey-Touched Gnome: Has the fey trait
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Gladitorial Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Heaven Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Astral Plane Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +0 (strength; untrained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Cleric Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 4 from any)
Deity: Skill Trained (Performance)
Gnome Obsession: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any Lore)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Animal Elocutionist: Can speak with all animals and gains +1 to Make An Impression on them
Burrow Elocutionist: Can speak with burrowing animals
Chameleon Gnome: (1) Gains +2 Stealth until surroundings change
Fey Fellowship: +2 Perception (fey)/Can make a -5 Diplomacy check to Make An Impression upon meeting fey and retry a failure after 1 min of conversation
Illusion Sense: +1 Perception (illusions)
Sensate Gnome: Has 30' imprecise scent; can use it to gain +2 Perception to locate a creature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 18 Armor Class: 14 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Glaive (+5 1d8 S [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Gnome Flickmace (+5 1d6 B; strength; expert); Gnome Hooked Hammer (+5 1d6 B/P [2h d10]; strength; expert); Kukri (+6 1d6 S; dexterity; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+1 1d6 S; dexterity; untrained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Deity: Attack Trained (Glaive)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Gnome Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Glaive; Kukri; Gnome Weapons)
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Glaive; Kukri)/Weapon Familiarity (Gnome Weapons)
Warpriest: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor)
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Has access to kukris and uncommon gnome weapons
Gnome Weapon Innovator: Critical hits with a glaive, kukri, or gnome weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vivacious Conduit: 10 min rest restores 1 HP
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +4 (dexterity; trained); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Warpriest: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Fey Fellowship: +2 vs. fey
Illusion Sense: +1 Will vs. illusions/R10' Automatically attempts to disbelieve illusions
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 2; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Divine Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Divine: +5 (wisdom; trained); Primal Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Divine: 15 (wisdom; trained); Primal Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Chill Touch (DC1 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+2 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Faerie Fire (D2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
Invisibility (D2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Prestidigitation (DC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Protector's Sacrifice (D1 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Transfers 3 Hit Points damage of the triggering attack from target to self (heightened +1 transfers +3 Hit Points)
Magic Notes:
Domain Initiate (Protection): Knows the Protector's Sacrifice divine spell/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
First World Adept: Knows the Faerie Fire and Invisibility divine innate spells; can cast each once per day
Warpriest: Spell Trained (Divine)
Deity: Has access to Color Spray, Enthrall, and Creation spells
Divine Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Energized Font: (1) Regains 1 Focus Point once per day
Fey-Touched Gnome: Can cast a chosen primal innate cantrip at will and can spend 10 min to choose a different cantrip once per day
First World Magic: Can cast a chosen divine innate cantrip at will
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at level 1 an additional 3 times per day
Wellspring Gnome (Divine): Can cast a chosen divine innate cantrip at will
